Pre-Game Insights: The Pittsburgh Pirates (68-76) will try to defeat the Miami Marlins (54-90) on Wednesday, September 11, 2024, at PNC Park in Pittsburgh, PA.
The starting pitchers will be Adam Mazur for the Miami Marlins and Bailey Falter for the Pittsburgh Pirates.
The line on this matchup has the Marlins at +130 while the Pirates open at -155. The over/under is set at 8.5.
The Miami Marlins are compiling 3.8 runs per game, which ranks them 29th in the league.
The Marlins have a team earned run average of 4.73 on the season, ranking 28th in MLB.
The Pittsburgh Pirates hold an on-base percentage of .302 and a batting average of .235 so far this year.
Pittsburgh has a team ERA of 4.16 and yields 4.63 runs per 9 innings, ranking 21st in MLB.
